text: Jasper Johns, Jr. (born May 15, 1930) is an American. contemporary artist. He works primarily in painting and printmaking.Finkel, Jori. Artist Dossier: Jasper Johns. May 2009, Art+Auction. He is known for creating Three Flags. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American artists Category:People from Augusta, Georgia Category:People from South Carolina
title: Jasper Johns
